title: Crossing Time
description: “I was never one to believe in urban legends, fairy tales, or any magical nonsense, not even when I was a child. Growing up in a small town with deep roots in mysticism and legends, not believing in the supernatural was almost heresy. But I was soon to discover that I had been wrong all along.”Madison Frost never believed in fairy tales or happily-ever-afters. She didn't have time to daydream about a knight in shining armor when she was desperately trying to keep her business from going under. When her town gets invaded by supernatural creatures, Madison saves a mysterious man who manages to breach the barriers of her steely heart. There's only one problem, she believes he can never be hers for loyalty is calling him back home, back to the 19th century.Albert Saint is a man filled with regret and anger. Forced to return to Crimson Hollow—a place he hates—he tries to forget his inner turmoil with alcohol and illegal fights. Everything changes in the evening someone tries to murder him. Albert narrowly escapes death and travels through time, crossing paths with a beautiful brunette who saves him. He can't explain the powerful connection he feels toward Madison, an emotion that will make him question everything he ever believed to be true.
author: M.H. Soars
